title: My mastery emote wont pop up
body: So, since the new patch with 6.9 and all the mage updates and stuff, right updated, everytime i played zed, and im a lvl 5 zed. So i have the emote, it doesnt pop up no matter if i press the key or not, it doesnt work, pls explain

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating. ^-^

Thanks for the acknowledgement. Seemed absurd to me that I had to tell Google to limit results to the last 24 hours to find even a mention of this.
Apparently most aren't quite as reliant on the mastery emote as I am.
so i just played a game with an azir, and he also said that the mastery emote wont pop up to, im not sure what this means but if they removed the emote im ded
I also had this occur on my tristana one game
